lyrics:
Morning light wakes sleeping trees Dew drops dance in gentle breeze Fields hum their workday song World feels right where we belong
Sun and rain take turns to play Night gives way to brighter day Seasons turn but life stays true Growing old while staying new
Rivers flow to distant seas Carrying hopes like fallen leaves Though the path may twist and bend Journey matters in the end
Moon rises soft and slow Peaceful night, calm we know
title: Nature's Way
